name: Atomic Zombie Motocross
description:
Game Objective: When the apocalyptic explosions settled, the only survivor became undead. A bored zombie looking for new challenges on a lonesome planet. Being unable to feel pain, made him create crazy motocross challenges that will keep testing his skills to find the limit. Can you help him overcome all the tough obstacles created by the post-apocalyptic environment?

Controls: Use Up / Down arrow keys to Move and Left / Right arrow keys to Rotate the motorcycle.
